course_title: Studies in Latin Prose and Verse - LATN PRSE & VRSE

001.comments: Topic: Cicero and his Reputation. Mostly prose readings with some verse. Visit cnrs.ubc.ca for full course descriptions.Cross-listed with LATN 503A.Students may 400-level LATN in the same year as LATN 350 and LATN 351 (co-requisites), but the 3rd year courses ar highly recommended as pre-requisites.

description: Thematic studies using both Latin prose and Latin verse. May be repeated for up to 6 credits.
